properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana Mungu
tunakuja mbele zako,
tunakuja leo na zawadi zetu
zipokee zibariki
ziwe za kupendeza.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Upokee mkate wetu
toka ngano ya nchi hii.
Upokee divai yetu
toka tunda la mzabibu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mazao ya mashamba
tunaleta mbele zako.
Nazo fedha za mifuko
twaomba uzipokee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Maisha na matendo yetu,
tunayaleta mbele zako.
Roho zetu zenye toba
twaomba uzipokee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tuhurumie si wakosefu
tunakuja mbele zako.
Tuletee baraka zako
kwetu sisi wenye dhambi.
